ad_account_id.description: The ID of the advertising account associated with the customer list.

created_time.description: The timestamp indicating when the customer list was created.

id.description: The unique identifier of the customer list.

name.description: The name given to the customer list for identification.

num_batches.description: The number of batches used to upload user records for the customer list.

num_removed_user_records.description: The count of user records removed from the customer list.

num_uploaded_user_records.description: The total number of user records uploaded to the customer list.

status.description: The current status of the customer list, such as active, inactive, etc.

type.description: The type of customer list, which can be standard, hashed, etc.

updated_time.description: The timestamp indicating when the customer list was last updated.
